workout_file.author: Zwift
workout_file.name: Week 5.1 - Volcano Climb Forward
workout_file.description: A race simulation on Volcano Climb Forward where you'll tackle 2 laps of the course.

textevent.message: Welcome back to another race simulation, today we're tackling 2 laps of Volcano Climb Forward!
Let's get started with a warmup 1st though - You'll need it today :-)
Aim for a comfortable cadence here.
All right, let's chat about today's workout a bit.
So, today we have a race simulation of Volcano Climb Forward.
The main feature today is the Volcano climb and where the race is won or lost.
With some flatter sections leading up to it where not much usually happens.
So priority #1 for a course like this, and really any race, is to conserve energy.
To spend it staying with, or attacking the group up the climb!
Just a little over 2min left for the warmup, let's carry on.
We'll do a couple of fast cadence efforts next to wake the legs up a bit more.
Aim for 110+ RPM next!
GO GO GO!
Great work, take it down easy again.
FAST FEET!
Excellent, now let's take a bit and recover before the start of today's race :-)
Deep breaths here, shake out the upper body a bit and get psyched up for the start.
All right, get ready to start hard and get into the lead group.
GO GO GO!
Keep the pressure on over the short climb.
Nice! Now recover down into the ocean tunnel.
on the flats of the ocean tunnel now, try to recover from the start effort here.
Just stay in the wheels here, and let the others chase down attacks if they happen.
Release any tension in the upper body, stay relaxed.
Get ready for the climb up out of the tunnel next, people always go wild here!
UP UP UP!
Nice work! Back onto the flats now as we wind through the fishing village.
Slight climb coming up next get ready for just a bit more effort.
All right, let's bring the cadence down just a bit here and grind it out up the climb.
Halfway there! Keep in the wheels here and stay relaxed still.
Next we'll descend down towards the volcano loop.
Super easy here, just breathe and relax.
On the flats now leading up to the climb. People will be excited here, pay attention!
The climb is just ahead! It is going to tickle a bit, get ready!
Let's go! Pick a comfortable cadence and stay with the group.
You'll see some splits start to form now, make sure you're on the right side.
WORK HERE! The climb flattens out just a bit soon where you can recovery a little.
False flat section here, try to recover as best you can and breathe.
Back on the gas again! GO GO GO!
C'mon! Don't get dropped from the group now!
Grit those teeth and get to the top here!
Final stretch up to the top! Stay with it!
Get ready to surge over the steep crest of the climb.
Attacks will happen here, don't let them go!
GO GO GO!
Phew! Holy cow, time to descend down this beast.
Breathe, relax, and use the super tuck here when you can.
Another minute for this descent, then we're back onto the flats again.
All right, this section is typically quiet as people recover from the climb still.
Just sit in the wheels, sip fluids, and stay relaxed again here.
Moving through the ocean tunnel again here, nice and steady.
Shoulders relaxed, elbows bent slightly, light grip on the bars here.
Remember to stand up as needed during these races too.
Especially if you feel like you need a stretch.
All right, get ready for the hard push up and out of the tunnel again!
GO GO GO!
Great work! Nice and steady again here, stay in control.
Learn to recover from those hard efforts while still being under pressure.
We're going to climbing again next, get ready to drop the cadence just a bit.
Cadence down here, nice and easy now, you're still in control here.
Keep your breathing from going ragged.
We'll descend into the volcano loop again next.
Nice and easy here, don't get gapped here.
All right, back onto the flats before the climb again.
Focus up here and get ready to WORK up this climb.
This is your time to shine! Be strong over the climb!
GO GO GO! Steady as you go here and pace yourself initially.
Close those gaps that form to stay in the lead group again now!
Flat section coming up, keep pushing!
Use this section wisely, deep breaths and recover.
Back onto the climb again, DIG!
Stay as relaxed as you can here, drop the shoulders down.
C'mon! Just 2min to the top! You can do this!
Final stretch! Stay vigilant for attacks to go early.
Final steep surge coming up!
Phew! That 2nd time is brutal, but you made it over with the group.
Let's recover again now and take some deep breaths.
Make sure you're sipping fluids here too.
Almost to the bottom, then we'll have a short section to the finish.
Make sure you're in the wheels at the bottom of this climb!
Back to work! Final section here before the sprint, make it happen!
The finish is just ahead now, stay patient and time your sprint.
Here we go, orange numbers are popping off.
GO GO GO! GET TO THE ARCH!
WOOT WOOT! Way to time that sprint to perfection and crush it, my friend!
We'll spend a few minutes cooling down now, then check off another workout.
See you next time :-)
